text:
e="preserve">Michael Angelis (18 January 1952 – 30 May 2020) was a British actor. He was best known for his roles in "Boys from the Black Stuff" and "G.B.H.". He was the narrator of the British children's television series "Thomas and Friends" from 1991 to 2012. He was born in Liverpool, England.
Angelis died on 30 May 2020 of a heart attack in Berkshire, aged 68.
